alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 22 at 8:11PM MDT until June 25 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River At La Junta affecting La Junta Vicinity/Otero County zone. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, La Junta...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON. HAS BEEN REPLACED WITH A RIVER FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Arkansas River At La Junta. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Moderate Flood. Local residential flooding is possible in La Junta. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM MDT.
